title: Chapter 1095 - The Lotus Platform Is Still Here, But Is He As He Was?
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1095 - The Lotus Platform Is Still Here, But Is He As He Was?

The Little Western Paradise

The Wilds’ number-one Buddhist Holy Land

An elderly monk sat cross-legged beneath a ninety-foot Bodhi Tree.

The tree trunk was thick and powerful, and its bark was like a dragon’s scales. The leaves filling its branches were vibrant and green, with a flowing, holy aura.

The old monk was stick-thin, and his wrinkles were like deep ravines. He sat there in complete stillness, not moving a muscle.

There was a lotus platform placed before him. It was absolutely wondrous, with a glazed luster. However, there was a startling sword scar on its surface.

Suddenly, a solemn voice resounded throughout the landscape. “Master, Pi Mo suffered a huge loss, and the Studio of the Heart lost several of its experts. Everyone beneath the heavens is paying attention to the Swordmaster of Abstruse Force’s reincarnation. They’re watching to see when he kills his way into the Abstruse Force Alliance and cuts Pi Mo down.”

A middle-aged man in white monk’s robes ambled over from afar.

When he was a hundred feet away from the Bodhi Tree, he stopped and clasped his palms together, looking as dignified as a Buddhist statue.
